result.name: social_services_performance_assessment_framework_paf_indicators
result.notes:
A set of 49 indicators that are collected from Local Authorities with Social Services responsibility. It covers indicators for older people, mental health, patient experience, Hospital Episodes, physical and learning disabilities, children.

Source: Department of Health (DoH): Commission for Social Care Inspection

Publisher: Commission for Social Care Inspection (CSCI)

Geographies: County/Unitary Authority, Government Office Region (GOR), National

Geographic coverage: England

Time coverage: 2002/2003 to 2003/2004

Type of data: Administrative data

odi-certificate.title: Social services Performance Assessment Framework (PAF) indicators

organization.name: department-of-health
organization.title: Department of Health and Social Care
organization.description:
The Department of Health and Social Care (DHSC) helps people to live better for longer. We lead, shape and fund health and social care in England, making sure people have the support, care and treatment they need, with the compassion, respect and dignity they deserve.

DHSC is a ministerial department, supported by 27 agencies and public bodies. 

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-of-health-and-social-care

result.precision: Performance Assessment Framework data for 2002/2003 and earlier years was collected and published by the Department of Health, Performance Assessment Framework data for 2003/2004 onwards is collected and published by the Commission for Social Care Inspection
result.title: Social services Performance Assessment Framework (PAF) indicators
